Text: I am only getting audio while trying to watch the episodes. The divx+ player has audio while other mkv file players I downloaded crash when I try to even open the file. I am wondering if I am missing a codec or something?

Try downloading CCCP (http://www.cccp-project.net/) for a Windows machine, or VLC (http://www.videolan.org/vlc/) for Mac or Linux. (I do not recommend VLC for Windows, but that is more of a personal preference.)

Thanks!

When I saw someone rate this a 10/10/10 I thought "pfft, pandering idiot".  Considering the age of the show (shot on film, early DVD release) the quality is not reflected by the small file size at all.  It actually is very good, and the subs are gorgeous.  I own the US Release DVDs, and only got this because the damn things won't play on my comp. >_<  FU Media Blasters.  Great show and a very nice torrent.
